DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study investigate clinical performance new silicone hydrogel contact lens period 6 month extend wear .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Performance Extended Wear Silicone Hydrogel Lenses
DOC.criteria: Is correctable least 6/9 distance visual acuity eye spherical contact lens . Is current daily wear soft contact lens wearer . Has clinically significant anterior eye finding . Has active ocular disease . Has systemic disease might interfere contact lens wear Is use systemic topical medication affect ocular health . Has preexist ocular irritation would preclude contact lens fitting . Has ocular pathology severe insufficiency lacrimal secretion ( dry eye ) would affect wear contact lens . Has undergone corneal refractive surgery . Is pregnant , lactate planning pregnancy .
